content:
Hi, welcome to my website! I am a Research Economist in the Monetary Policy Analysis Division at the Swiss National Bank. I hold a PhD in Finance from the Swiss Finance Institute and the University of Zurich. My research covers bond markets and derivatives, as well as the real effects of credit market frictions.
Disclaimer: This is my own website. The views expressed here are solely my own and do not reflect those of the Swiss National Bank.
